cu.explanation_en: Setting the MCC to 999 exceeds the valid range for Mobile Country Code (typically 3 digits, 000-999 but reserved values), causing invalid PLMN configuration and network registration failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting the downlink carrier bandwidth to 1000 PRBs exceeds the maximum allowed bandwidth for the frequency band, causing configuration validation failure and cell setup error.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行載波頻寬設定為 1000 PRB 超過頻段允許的最大頻寬，會導致配置驗證失敗和細胞設定錯誤。
